data.title: Genealogy.com
data.meta_description:
Farnsworth: Hello Pamela,

I am NOT related to this fam... Read more on Genealogy.com!
data.text:
Hello Pamela,

I am NOT related to this family in any way.Saw your post and believe this is your grandparents.You didn't say where they were born or lived and didn't say what your grandmother's maiden name was.
